title: Easy rocket, cherry tomato and pinenut salad
ingredients: ['1 100g bag wild rocket', '1/2 punnet cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons pinenuts', '2 tablespoons grapeseed oil or olive oil', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large avocado - peeled, stone removed and sliced']
